column3: hom mbɔ hom nsamu; Hom mfa konyim ndze mbɔ ose mma Nyankopɔn."

column4: no ho yɛ hu; Ɔyɛ Ɔhen kɛse wɔ asaase nyinara do."

column3: Na ɔdze amanaman hyɛ hɛn ananadze."

column2: "Ɔsan mu yi hɛn egyapadze ma hɛn

column3: hom ntow ayɛyindwom: Hom ntow ayɛyindwom mma hɛn Hen no

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn nye asaase nyinara do Hen: Hom mfa asanku ntow ayɛyindwom mma no."
"Nyankopɔn dzi amanaman do hen: Nyankopɔn tse n’ahengua krɔnkrɔn do."
"Aman ahemfo aboa ano Abɛyɛ Abraham Nyankopɔn ne man: Na asaase do akyɛm dzi wɔ Nyankopɔn; Woehuhor no kɛsenara."
